meanings.sent1: The chronicling of ancient battles helps us understand the past.
meanings.sent2: I found an interesting chronicling of World War II events in the library.
meanings.sent3: The chronicling of my daily activities would make a boring book.
meanings.sent4: Her journal is a detailed chronicling of her travels around the world.
meanings.sent5: The chronicling of the ship's journey was meticulously kept in the captain's log.

meanings.definition: To document or record events in order of occurrence
meanings.sent1: She enjoys chronicling her adventures in a travel journal.
meanings.sent2: The historian spent years chronicling the rise and fall of the empire.
meanings.sent3: Chronicling the antics of her pets always brings a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The artist's paintings chronicled the changing seasons in the countryside.
meanings.sent5: He is chronicling the history of his family through old photographs and stories.
